ðŸŽ¯ Primary Use Case: Embedding a Steam miniprofile on a website
âœ¨ Key Features: â€¢ Loads Steam miniprofile with animated background and frame as an HTML entity â€¢ Supports multiple languages via query parameter 'lang' â€¢ Displays featured game with playtime using query parameter 'appId' â€¢ Allows interactive miniprofile with click to open Steam profile using parameters 'interactive' and 'vanityId'
ðŸ“– Summary: This tool embeds a user's public Steam miniprofile onto a website. It supports various languages, featured games, and interactive elements, all without needing an API key. The miniprofile is loaded as an HTML entity and can be customized with CSS.
